TopicTitle: A New Member Join in This Community

Articles.Content:
Hello Community,

Greeting to all members of this community. My name is Anthony Martello. I am very new to this forum. I want to be a member of this discussion group and gain a lot of knowledge about this site and I also want to share my thoughts. Hope all the members of this forum will cooperate with me. If any type of inconvenience, then I apologize for that.

Best Regards,

Anthony Martello

Welcome aboard!

Prepare to smash into the surface of the mun in 3.. 2.. 1!

Hi AnthonyMartello, welcome to the community

It's no inconvenience at all friend, have fun on the forums

Welcome to the fourms, AnthonyMartello.

Hope you enjoy yourself around here.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!
Welcome, Anthony! I hope you gain lots of info from the forums and have fun massively reducing the Kerbal population!
Welcome Anthony, I'm pretty new here as well. And in my short time here I have learned alot. I think you will find this community active and very helpfull.
